title: Drift 101
description: Naoki Kobayashi of Drift 101 join us this week alongside our friend Jason Connor (@TerminatorConn) from Hooniverse + Cammed & Tubbed.  Naoki is an instructor at Drift 101 and shares his insights in teaching people to drift and the wide array of students they work with.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
